entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending early this morning then mainly cloudy. Showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
